headline: Jack Ma-Backed Ant Showcases Its First Humanoid Robot
summary: The companyâ€™s unit Shanghai Ant Lingbo Technology Co., also known as Robbyant, demonstrated its R1 humanoid model at the 2025 Inclusion Conference on the Bund in Shanghai.  The robot can serve as a tour guide, sort medicine at pharmacies, provide medical consultation or perform basic kitchen tasks.  Ant is the latest big name to delve into humanoid robots, a nascent field fought over by the likes of Tesla Inc. and dotted by up-and-comers like Hangzhou neighbor Unitree Robotics.
